g.text: Dataset Class - EEG Signal Processing System
extract_channels(data_array: NDArray, channel_names: List[str], dataset_name: str) : NDArray
load_event_with_channels(event_path: str, channel_names: List[str], dataset_name: str) : dict
Main class for handling EEG datasets
Supports BDF, EDF, and BrainVision formats
Provides channel mapping and event extraction
